Sentencas: To detect miscibility gap in [(CeO2)(x)(ZrO2)(1-x)](0.8)(YO1.5)(0.2) (x = 0-1), powders prepared by liquid-mixing method were investigated by conventional X-ray diffraction (NXRD) and Synchrotron X-ray diffraction (SXRD).
Titulo: Miscibility gap in CeO2-ZrO2-YO1.5 system as an electrode of solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The NXRD pattern of the samples, calcined at 873 K, exhibited a broadened cubic structure without any secondary phases.
Titulo: Miscibility gap in CeO2-ZrO2-YO1.5 system as an electrode of solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The lattice constants or samples annealed at different temperatures were determined, and they show linear dependence on cerium content (x) except for 1273 K, which indicates that a complete solid solution can be obtained above 1473 K.
Titulo: Miscibility gap in CeO2-ZrO2-YO1.5 system as an electrode of solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The NXRD results on samples annealed at 1273 K exhibit deviation from Vegard's law.
Titulo: Miscibility gap in CeO2-ZrO2-YO1.5 system as an electrode of solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The SXRD patterns confirmed the existence of miscibility gap in the samples of x = 0.5-0.8 annealed at T = 1273 K for 778 h. (C) 2001
Titulo: Miscibility gap in CeO2-ZrO2-YO1.5 system as an electrode of solid oxide fuel cell
